body: I don't see what's overly bad about it, apart from the slightly atrocious dialogue during the act. The art was great, the translation was mostly ok. I've come not to expect much given that Egl isn't everyone's first language. Believe me, I'd love the dialogue during sex to be a bit more realistic, but hey. It's free, we can't be so picky.
What the fuck is up with the subtitles? Billy? Really?
